sourcesContent:
import {
    Modal,
    ModalOverlay,
    ModalContent,
    ModalHeader,
    ModalFooter,
    ModalBody,
    ModalCloseButton,
    Button,
    Image,
    Grid,
    GridItem,
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    Select,
    useDisclosure
  } from '@chakra-ui/react'

  export default function ClothingModal(props: any) {
    //console.log(props.isOpen)
    return (
      <>
        <Button onClick={props.onOpen}>Open Modal</Button>
  
        <Modal isOpen={true} onClose={props.onClose} size="full">
          <ModalOverlay />
          <ModalContent>
            <ModalHeader>Add Clothing</ModalHeader>
            <ModalCloseButton />
            <ModalBody>
              <FormControl>
                <Grid
                  h='100%'
                  templateColumns='repeat(14, 1fr)'
                  gap={4}
                >
                  <GridItem colSpan={4} bg='transparent'>
                    <Image
                      src={"/" + props.clothing?.image}
                      alt={"Clothing " + props.clothing?.id}
                      borderRadius='lg'
                    />
                  </GridItem>
                  <GridItem colSpan={2} bg='transparent'>
                    Type
                  </GridItem>
                  <GridItem colSpan={2} bg='transparent'>
                    Color(s)
                  </GridItem>
                  <GridItem colSpan={3} bg='transparent'>
                      <Select placeholder={props.clothing?.type}>
                        <option value='dress'>Dress</option>
                        <option value='jacket'>Jacket</option>
                        <option value='pants'>Pants</option>
                        <option value='shorts'>Shorts</option>
                        <option value='tops'>Pants</option>
                        <option value='shoes'>Shoes</option>
                        <option value='skirt'>Skirts</option>
                        <option value='sweater'>Sweater</option>
                      </Select>
                  </GridItem>
                  <GridItem colSpan={3} bg='transparent' />
                </Grid>
              </FormControl>
            </ModalBody>
            <ModalFooter>
              <Button colorScheme='blue' mr={3} onClick={props.onClose}>
                Close
              </Button>
              <Button variant='ghost'>Secondary Action</Button>
            </ModalFooter>
          </ModalContent>
        </Modal>
      </>
    )
  }
